section.simpara: Waits the specified number of seconds for a ring signal.
Waits a maximum of timeout seconds for a ring signal, which is only treated as valid until the second ring has completed.
Returns 0 on success, or -1 if the channel is hung up.
section.programlisting: ; Wait 5 seconds for ring, then send DTMF: exten => 123,1,Answer() exten => 123,n,WaitForRing(5) exten => 123,n,SendDTMF(1234)

para.screen:
-= Info about application 'WaitForRing' =-
[Synopsis] Wait for Ring Application
[Description] WaitForRing(timeout) Returns 0 after waiting at least timeout seconds. and only after the next ring has completed. Returns 0 on success or -1 on hangup
